author: Duc Le
title: AI-Powered Image Recognition System
description: Developed an advanced image recognition system using deep learning techniques to identify and classify objects in real-time.

content.text: This project involved building a state-of-the-art image recognition system that can identify and classify objects in real-time with high accuracy. The system was built using **TensorFlow** and **PyTorch**, and was trained on a large dataset of images.

Key features include:

- Real-time object detection and classification
- Support for multiple object classes
- High accuracy and low latency
- Mobile-friendly implementation
- Integration with existing security systems

notableObservations: The system achieved a 98% accuracy rate in controlled environments and 92% in real-world scenarios.
Processing time was reduced from 200ms to 50ms per frame through optimization techniques.
unexpectedInsights: The system performed better in low-light conditions than anticipated, likely due to the diverse training dataset.
Users reported that the confidence scores provided with each detection were particularly useful for decision-making.
